title: kOdaNDa dIksha
sahitya:
kOdaNDa dIkSA guruDavanucu ninnu goliciyuNTini gAdA

anupallavi

 nA daNDamunukai konirAkayuNDuTa nyAyamu gAdu gadA rAma ninnu

caraNam 1

 vErE daivamulanu vinuti sEyaka ninnE vEDu cuNTini gAdA 
nEramu mannincu bhAramu nIdani nammiyuNTini gAdA rAmayya
 
caraNam 2

 kOpamuncaka nAdu kodava dIrcadavani kOriyuNTini gAdA 
tApatrayamula daNDinca kuNDuTa nIku dharmamu gAdu gAdA O rAma
 
caraNam 3

 mA manOhara nIdu mahimala dalaci maimaraciyuNTini gAdA 
rAmacandrapura vara shrI vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavata vinutuDavaiyunna
